stories.headline: a
stories.bodyText:
Jones suggested he was ready to tag Parsons in 2026 and 2027 after his rookie deal, effectively keeping him under team control for three more years.

Parsons responded to Jones‚Äôs comments by quoting a bible verse from the Book of Micah and wiping Cowboys mentions from his social media.

stories.headline: a
stories.bodyText:
Quenton Marselles Brown, father of Celtics star Jaylen Brown, was arrested and charged after allegedly stabbing a man multiple times following a car incident.	

Court documents confirmed bail was set at $300,000 following Brown‚Äôs first court appearance.

stories.headline: a
stories.bodyText:
Roughly a month after Bueckers said her dream courtside celebrity guests are Grey's Anatomy's Ellen Pompeo and Criminal Minds' Shemar Moore, Moore decided to pull up for the Wings' game vs. the Sparks in L.A.‚Äîand he picked a great night to do it. 





After the game, Moore met Bueckers in the tunnel, capping off her ‚Äúbest night ever.‚Äù

stories.headline: a
stories.bodyText:
The SEC presidents and chancellors approved moving to a nine-game conference schedule, up from eight, beginning in 2026.


Commissioner Greg Sankey said the move ‚Äúunderscores our universities‚Äô commitment to delivering the most competitive football schedule in the nation.

stories.headline: a
stories.bodyText:
Rookie QB Jaxson Dart impressed in preseason, but Russell Wilson has been named the starter ‚Äî a setup that could spark calls for a switch if Wilson struggles.	

The Giants open the season against the Commanders on September 7, with Wilson firmly in the starting role.

stories.headline: a
stories.bodyText:
The first 18,000 fans received a bobblehead of George Costanza, played by Jason Alexander, depicted napping under his desk from the Season 8 episode ‚ÄúThe Nap.‚Äù	

In the episode, Costanza actually hires a handyman to expand the space under his desk for naps, complete with a cupholder and blanket drawer.
What quote from ‚ÄúThe Nap‚Äù
